name: Lunar Rot
description:
Welcome to the Lunar base! Explore this eerie station located on a far moon in this top down stealth horror metroidvania. The station appears to be completely devoid of life... But is it? Piece together the story of this ill fated station, and try to escape...

Headphones are recommended as sound is essential to your survival.

The optional story mode completely disables enemies. Use this if you just want an atmospheric experience, without spooks.

Certain story elements are unfortunately not yet finished. Please report any bugs you find!

Thank you for playing :)
